sourceDesc.bibl: BONAIUTI, Italian scenery representing the manners, coustoms and amusements of the different states of Italy containing thirty-two coloured engravings by James Godby, from original drawings by P. Van Lerberghi, London 1806, fig. Con 32 tavole collocate superiormente e con tutto il lusso e l’eleganza dei tipi e della calcografìa.
